After Kellyanne Williamson&#039;s(Sapphire Boyce) two imaginary friends go "missing,"
she is suddenly struck by a mysterious illness.

Her big brother, Ashmol(Christian Byers) has never seen these magical playmates,
but he knows something must be done to reach his sister.

Despite all his doubts, he rallies friends and family for an inspirational
journey to find the missing friends. Together, they discover what Kellyanne has
always known...that you don&#039;t always need to see to believe.
